name: Frozen Banshee

skills.name: Death's Caress
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has an 80% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns if the target is under a [Poison Sensitivity] debuff.

effects.notes: 2 hits, 2.2 ATK multiplier per hit. Total damage: 4.4 ATK across both hits.

Each hit has 80% base chance (100% when fully booked) to place a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns. CONDITIONAL: Only works if target already has [Poison Sensitivity] debuff from A3. This is her PRIMARY damage source in CB.

skills.book_value: HIGH PRIORITY - +20% debuff chance (80%→100%, 10%+10% from books) AND +25% damage (5%+5%+5%+10%). MUST book to 100% poison chance for CB reliability.
skills.notes: THE CORE DAMAGE SKILL. With Poison Sensitivity active (A3), this applies two 5% Poison debuffs per attack. In CB with counterattack, can stack poisons extremely fast. Each hit rolls independently for poison. Requires high ACC to land debuffs. Multi-hit is valuable for FK shield breaking.

skills.name: Cruel Exultation
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 2% for each debuff on the target.

effects.notes: High multiplier single-target damage. 6.5 ATK multiplier.

Fills Turn Meter of ALL allies by 2% PER debuff on target. With 10 debuffs on CB = 20% TM boost to entire team. CRITICAL: In speed-tuned CB teams, this skill can BREAK speed tune. Many users disable A2 for CB.

skills.book_value: MEDIUM PRIORITY - +30% damage (5%+10%+10%) AND -1 turn CD (4→3). For CB, many players DO NOT book this skill to avoid TM issues. For dungeons/arena, booking is beneficial.
skills.notes: SPEED TUNE WARNING: This skill can break CB speed tunes due to TM boost. Many Budget Unkillable users DISABLE A2 (via AI settings or manual control) to maintain rotation. For dungeons/arena, this is excellent for team speed cycling. With 10 debuffs on boss = 20% team TM boost.

skills.name: Frost Blight
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 25% [Poison Sensitivity] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Places 25% [Poison Sensitivity] debuff for 2 turns. THE ENABLER for A1 poison application. Also increases ALL poison damage on target by 25%. CRITICAL for her kit to function.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL PRIORITY - +20% damage (5%+5%+10%) AND -2 turns CD (5→3). MUST book for CB use. Reduces cooldown to 3 turns, enabling better poison uptime and synergy with Master Hexer mastery.
skills.notes: THE ENABLER SKILL. MUST be applied before A1 can place poisons. AI has been fixed (post-Patch 1.13.5) to prioritize this skill on bosses. With Master Hexer mastery + 3-turn CD, can maintain near-permanent Poison Sensitivity on CB. All poisons (from any source) deal +25% damage while this is active. Priority: Apply A3 first, then spam A1 for poison stacking.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 35.
forms.comments: Frozen Banshee is THE budget Clan Boss poison specialist. Despite being Rare, she rivals or exceeds many Legendaries for CB poison damage. Post-Patch 1.13.5, her AI is vastly improved (prioritizes A3 on bosses). Critical for Budget Unkillable comps. DO NOT FEED.

stat_priorities: ACC 250+ (CRITICAL - must land debuffs on UNM CB)
SPD 170-200 (speed tune dependent for CB, 180-200 for dungeons)
HP% 35,000+ (survivability - she has very low base HP)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: ACC 250+ (UNM requirement), SPD 170-191 (comp dependent - must speed tune), HP% 35,000-40,000, DEF% 1,500-2,000, C.RATE 70-100% (Warmaster), C.DMG 150+ (Warmaster). Focus ACC and survivability first - her damage comes from poisons, not raw ATK.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: ACC 200-250, SPD 180-200, HP% 30,000+, DEF% 1,200+, C.RATE 85-100%, C.DMG 150+. Balance survivability with damage stats.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: ACC 300+, SPD 200-250, HP% 30,000+, C.RATE 100%, C.DMG 200+. Not her primary role - better options exist.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: ACC 250-350 (boss requirements), SPD 180-200, HP% 35,000+, DEF% 1,500+. Similar to CB but higher ACC for DT Hard bosses.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: ACC 150-200, SPD 170-190, HP% 30,000+, DEF% 1,200+. Aura: +35 ACC in all battles (excellent for Undead Hordes faction).

recommended_gear: CLAN BOSS (Budget Unkillable): Lifesteal + Speed sets. ACC gloves OR C.RATE gloves (if can't reach 70% C.RATE from subs), HP% chest, SPD boots. HP% ring. ACC or HP amulet. ACC banner (minimum 60 ACC). Substats: ACC (250+ total), SPD (speed tune), HP%, DEF%, C.RATE (70%+). Speed tune to 171-191 depending on comp.

CLAN BOSS (Counterattack team): Lifesteal + Accuracy OR Speed sets. Focus ACC (250+), SPD (speed tune), survivability (HP%/DEF%). Warmaster is critical - lifesteal procs on Warmaster hits for massive healing.
DUNGEONS: Lifesteal + Speed OR Bloodthirst + Speed. ACC 200-250, SPD 180-200. HP%/DEF% for survivability. C.RATE 85-100% for Warmaster consistency.
ARENA (niche use): Speed + Accuracy. ACC 300+, SPD 200-250. Not recommended - better poison champions exist for arena.

NOTE: Lifesteal is CRITICAL for CB - she has extremely low base HP/DEF. Warmaster procs + Lifesteal = 20-30K healing per proc. ACC is non-negotiable for CB (250+ for UNM). Speed tuning is mandatory for unkillable comps.

clan_boss: Offense Tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster (T6 - CRITICAL for damage AND healing)

Support Tree: Pinpoint Accuracy (ACC boost), Charged Focus, Arcane Celerity (AVOID for speed-tuned teams), Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel, Evil Eye (one-time TM drop), Master Hexer (extend Poison Sensitivity 2→3 turns), Spirit Haste (AVOID for speed-tuned teams)

NOTE: For Budget Unkillable, AVOID Arcane Celerity and Spirit Haste - they break speed tuning. Evil Eye procs once per battle (turn 1 TM drop). Master Hexer is CRITICAL - extends Poison Sensitivity uptime.
clan_boss_counterattack: Offense Tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Life Drinker, Single Out, Bring it Down, Wrath of the Slain (NOT Cycle of Magic - breaks rotation), Methodical, Warmaster (T6)
Support Tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, Lore of Steel, Master Hexer
NOTE: Counterattack setup avoids all TM/speed manipulation masteries. Wrath of the Slain for extra damage on low-HP targets.
clan_boss_self_counter: Offense Tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Grim Resolve, Single Out, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster (T6)
Defense Tree: Tough Skin, Rejuvenation, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution (self-counterattack chance), Deterrence
NOTE: Uses Retribution mastery for self-counterattack procs. More defensive build for survivability.
dungeons: Similar to standard CB build - Warmaster, Master Hexer, Pinpoint Accuracy. Can take Arcane Celerity/Spirit Haste for dungeons (no speed tune needed).
arena: Offense/Support focus - Warmaster, Pinpoint Accuracy, Swarm Smiter, Master Hexer. Not her primary role.
doom_tower: Similar to CB - Warmaster, Master Hexer, defensive substats. Focus survivability for boss fights.
faction_wars: Similar to dungeons - balanced Offense/Support with Warmaster and Master Hexer.
masteries.general: Warmaster is MANDATORY for all PVE content. Master Hexer is CRITICAL for extending Poison Sensitivity. AVOID speed/TM masteries for speed-tuned CB teams.

blessings: Phantom Touch (Damage Dealer) - extra debuff chance (pairs well with poison application)
Cruelty (Debuffer) - increases debuff duration (synergizes with Master Hexer for extended poisons)
NOTE: Blessings are LOW priority for Frozen Banshee - her value is mechanics and poisons, not raw stats. Save blessings for main DPS.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: POST-PATCH 1.13.5: AI is significantly improved. She now prioritizes A3 (Poison Sensitivity) on bosses before using A1. HOWEVER: She will NOT use A2 (Cruel Exultation) against enemies with MORE than 2 debuffs, and will NOT use A3 against minions (e.g., Ice Golem adds). For CB, many users DISABLE A2 manually to avoid TM manipulation breaking speed tunes. Overall AI is GOOD for auto CB/dungeon use, especially post-patch.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Budget Unkillable (with Maneater + Pain Keeper) and Counterattack comps
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info:
Frozen Banshee is THE poison champion for Budget Unkillable Clan Boss comps. Her kit:

1) POISON STACKING: A1 applies TWO 5% poisons per attack (when Poison Sensitivity is active). In counterattack comps, she can stack 8-10 poisons in 2-3 turns.

2) POISON SENSITIVITY: A3 increases ALL poison damage by 25%. This amplifies poison from ALL sources (not just hers).

3) ACCURACY AURA: +35 ACC in all battles helps entire team land debuffs.

CORE COMPS:

**Budget Unkillable (2-key UNM):**
- Maneater + Pain Keeper + Frozen Banshee + 2 DPS/Debuffers
- Speed tune: FB 170-191 SPD (comp dependent)
- FB provides 80-90% of poison damage
- Typical damage: 15-25M per key on UNM

**Counterattack Comps:**
- Skullcrusher/Valkyrie + Frozen Banshee + 3 support/DPS
- FB counters every boss AOE → massive poison application
- Typical damage: 20-35M per key on UNM with good gear

**Vizier Ovelis Synergy:**
- Vizier extends debuff duration → Poison Sensitivity stays for 5-8 turns
- Poisons accumulate to max stack (10) and stay there
- FB + Vizier = 25-40M damage on UNM

REQUIREMENTS:
- A1 AND A3 MUST be fully booked (100% poison chance, 3-turn A3 CD)
- ACC 250+ for UNM (non-negotiable)
- Master Hexer mastery (extends Poison Sensitivity 2→3 turns)
- Disable A2 for speed-tuned comps (TM boost breaks rotation)
- Lifesteal gear + Warmaster for sustain

SYNERGIZES WITH:
- Maneater + Pain Keeper (Budget Unkillable core)
- Skullcrusher/Valkyrie (Counterattack)
- Vizier Ovelis (extend debuffs)
- Decrease DEF champions (Tayrel, Rhazin)
- Decrease ATK champions (Jareg, Coffin Smasher)
- Any support that keeps her alive (Doompriest, Rector Drath)

AVOID PAIRING WITH:
- Other heavy poisoners (Occult Brawler, Kael) if debuff limit is reached
- TM manipulators in speed-tuned comps
- Champions that steal debuff slots (bombs, burns if not synergistic)

VALUE: Enables F2P/budget players to 2-key or 1-key UNM Clan Boss with minimal investment. DO NOT FEED.

mechanics_advisory:
Frozen Banshee is a Rare champion with S-tier Clan Boss value. Her poison output rivals or exceeds most Legendaries when built correctly. Post-Patch 1.13.5 AI improvements make her reliable on auto.

**CORE STRENGTHS:**

1. **CLAN BOSS (10/10):** THE budget poison champion. With Poison Sensitivity active, she applies 2x 5% poisons per A1 attack. In counterattack comps, this is 2-4 poisons per boss turn. Typical CB damage: 15-25M (Budget Unkillable), 20-35M (Counterattack), 25-40M (with Vizier). MUST be fully booked and speed-tuned.

2. **DUNGEONS (8/10):** Excellent for Dragon 25, Ice Golem 25, and Magma Dragon (Doom Tower). A1 multi-hit helps FK shield. Poison Sensitivity amplifies team poison damage. ACC aura supports debuffers.

3. **DOOM TOWER (7/10):** Strong for boss fights requiring poison (Magma Dragon, Nether Spider, Eternal Dragon). Needs high ACC for DT Hard bosses (300-350).

4. **FACTION WARS (6/10):** Solid Undead Hordes support. ACC aura is valuable. Poison damage helps boss stages. Low base stats limit wave clear.

5. **ARENA (5/10):** Not recommended - better options exist. Poison is slow damage in speed-meta arena. Only viable in tanky stall comps.

**KEY MECHANICS:**

- **Poison Dependency:** A1 poisons ONLY work if Poison Sensitivity (A3) is active. MUST apply A3 first.
- **Speed Tuning:** In Budget Unkillable/speed-tuned comps, she MUST go in specific order. Disable A2 to avoid TM manipulation.
- **Master Hexer:** CRITICAL mastery - extends Poison Sensitivity from 2→3 turns, enabling near-permanent uptime on CB.
- **ACC Requirements:** 250+ for UNM CB, 200-250 for dungeons, 300-350 for DT Hard bosses. Non-negotiable.
- **Booking Priority:** A3 first (reduce CD 5→3), then A1 (100% poison chance), A2 last (optional - many skip for CB).

**SYNERGY NOTES:**

- Works with ANY Clan Boss comp as long as speed-tuned correctly
- Pairs excellently with Vizier Ovelis (debuff extension)
- Synergizes with Decrease DEF/Weaken for more damage from Warmaster
- Requires support for survivability (Decrease ATK, Ally Protection, Healing)

**COMMON MISTAKES:**

- Using without booking A1/A3 → unreliable poison application
- Not disabling A2 in speed-tuned comps → breaks rotation
- Insufficient ACC → debuffs resisted, damage plummets
- Building ATK% → poison damage doesn't scale with ATK, focus survivability
- Pairing with too many poisoners → hit debuff limit, waste slots

**BOTTOM LINE:**

Frozen Banshee is S-tier for Clan Boss despite being Rare. She enables budget players to compete in UNM and is a core champion for many endgame CB teams. DO NOT FEED. Fully book A1/A3, get ACC to 250+, speed tune correctly, and she will carry CB damage for months or years.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Base stats from existing JSON file (14,700 HP, 1,046 ATK, 1,002 DEF, 99 SPD, 15 C.RATE, 50 C.DMG, 30 RES, 10 ACC) - validated as correct for level 60 Rare. Skills and info from Ayumilove (canonical source, post-Patch 1.13.5 buffs).

citations: Patch Notes V1.13.5 (2020-03-16): Frost Blight skill buffed, AI improved for boss prioritization
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Frozen Banshee is THE budget Clan Boss poison specialist. Post-Patch 1.13.5, she is S-tier for CB despite Rare rarity. MUST be fully booked (A1/A3), speed-tuned, and built with high ACC (250+). Core of Budget Unkillable and Counterattack comps. DO NOT FEED - she is irreplaceable for budget/F2P CB progression. User Priority: Clan Boss UNM (Priority 1) - Frozen Banshee is CRITICAL for poison damage. NOTE: Faction is Undead Hordes, NOT Knight Revenant.

update_notes.last_patch: V1.13.5 (2020-03-16) - Frost Blight buffed (now 100% chance to place Poison Sensitivity), AI improved (prioritizes A3 on bosses). Kit has been stable since patch.
